title: Stopping identity thieves from stealing your face
text:
Stopping identity thieves from stealing your face Wednesday, February 14, 2018 - 02:04 
Riding the wave of a global push to comply with new privacy standards, a small Israeli company believes it can help you, and your face, stay anonymous in a hyper-connected world. Rinat Harash reports from Tel Aviv.   
Riding the wave of a global push to comply with new privacy standards, a small Israeli company believes it can help you, and your face, stay anonymous in a hyper-connected world. Rinat Harash reports from Tel Aviv.  //reut.rs/2sz3Qrm
